paper_abstract: We present analytically the exact energy bound-states solutions of the Schrodinger equation in D dimensions for a recently proposed modified Kratzer plus ring-shaped potential by means of the Nikiforov-Uvarov method. We obtain an explicit solution of the wave functions in terms of hyper-geometric functions (Laguerre polynomials). The results obtained in this work are more general and true for any dimension which can be reduced to the well-known three-dimensional forms given by other works.
paper_title: Exact solutions of the modified Kratzer potential plus ring-shaped potential in the d-dimensional Schrodinger equation by the Nikiforov-Uvarov method
